channel.title: Thieving help!

item.title: Thieving help!
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

How to i check, if a player got 99 thieving? (Delta)
Where to add this: if(playerHasItem(2710, 1)){
-code-

if(NPCID == 2270){
addItem(2710 ,1);
if(NPCID == 2270) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2270), 4884);
sendFrame126(“There you go, enjoy you still cape.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sendFrame75(2270, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
} else {
if(NPCID == 2270) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2270), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Sorry you need 99 Thieving to get a skill cape.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sendFrame75(2270, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}
}

Read full topic
